Title: Dex, Lies, and Videotape
Plot: A copy-cat killer follows the lead of the "Bay Harbor Butcher." Dexter must destroy an incriminating surveillance video.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jaime Murray, Keith Carradine, Dave Baez, Silas Weir Mitchell, John Ciccolini, Salvator Xuereb, JoBeth Williams
